items.text: over the top comes down the track and gets under the ball nicely to lift it straight back. Hits the advertising hoarding at long-off on the flush. It's given as four
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball on the stumps, and defended towards cover
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Liton Das, no run

items.text: bumper digs this in and puts some back into it. Sails over the batsman's head though and is a wide
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Liton Das, 1 wide

items.text: slower ball on off, he waits for it and glides it to third man
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: leading edge but safe turned the bat too early and the ball flew off the edge but there was no gully and it rolls to third man
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower short ball, rises to chest high and he can get on his toes and pat it down towards midwicket
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText:
Nabi into the attack

Saurabh: "Oh no Afghanistan what have you done! Last game you dropped Malik and then went on to lose the match. This game dropping another important player! Mushfiqur makes you pay when you drop his catch. Lets hope they are able to turn it around."

ANUP KUMAR SAHU: "@Michale, FYI Afghanistan was not born out of disputed land between IND-PAK. It was recognized as a nation by getting independence from british in 1919."
items.text: floated up on the stumps, he waits for it and drives it gently past the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: tossed up again, but on the pads, turned away to square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: flatter into the pads, tucked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Nisarg: "To honest, I know where Ban lose their momentum in Asia Cup against previous group stage encounter with AFG. I feel, they should have rested Mushi and Fizz. They should have played with strong unit and rest can't help again india to win the game. After losing with big margin.. the momentum slips away. "
items.text: angles across the batsman, but gives him enough room to slash it away towards the point fence where third man runs around to his right to clean up
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on off, bounces a bit and defended
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full ball, gets down on one knee to sweep it to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Fun fact: only three boundaries in Bangladesh's innings so far, two of them by Liton. Considering that, his strike rate has been pretty good
items.text: short of a length outside off, he stays on the backfoot to cut it. Good timing but straight to point
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slower ball on off, patted down and he wanted the quick single but Liton refused
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: beaten slower ball, on a length outside off. He tried to run it down to third man but missed it
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length outside off, steered to point
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slower ball again on off stump, he guides it to point
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: change of pace again, but straighter and he can tuck it towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Gulbadin Naib to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Meanwhile, Mushfiqur has become the third Bangladesh player to aggregate 5000 ODI runs.
items.text: floated up on the stumps, turned towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: comes down the track, but he spots him and shortens his length. Batsman can only tuck it to mid-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, he swipes it towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: paddled fine spots the line and length early and goes down to paddle it very fine. Not enough contact though and the ball stops short of the fence
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: gives himself room but the bowler fires it into his legs. Clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: goes over the keeper's head paddled-scooped from the stumps over the keeper. Mushfiqur becoming innovative
items.shortText: Mohammad Nabi to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.preText: Aftab is back List of Bangladesh's highest run-scorers in ODIs.
items.text: starts with a bouncer well targeted, and the batsman has to duck/sway out of the way
items.shortText: Aftab Alam to Liton Das, no run
